long_description: The Kelty Woobie Sleeping Bag is designed to keep your little one warm down to about 30degF on summer camping trips. A zipper on each side makes it easy for them to get in and out on their own. 2-layer offset quilt construction with Cloudloft(TM) synthetic insulation keeps your child toasty warm. Polyester taffeta lining feels great next to skin. Zipper draft tubes keep cold air from sneaking in and are designed so they won't snag in the zippers. Kelty Woobie Sleeping Bag for kids comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: The Kelty Woobie Sleeping Bag is designed to keep your little one warm down to about 30degF on summer camping trips. A zipper on each side makes it easy for them to get in and out on their own.
